details.title: NGSI Entity To PoI
details.description: Convert NGSI entities coming from the orion context broker to Point of Interests (usable by map widgets).

preference.name: coordinates_attr
preference.label: Coordinates attribute
preference.description: Name of the entity attribute where the coordinates are stored. If the entity provides the coordinates through a pair of attributes, you can pass those names using a comma (e.g. 'latitude, longitude')

preference.name: marker-icon
preference.label: Marker Icon
preference.description: Absolute URL pointing to an image that will be used for the markers created by this operator. Leave this setting empty for using the default marker icon

outputendpoint.name: poiOutput
outputendpoint.label: PoI
outputendpoint.description: Transformed Point of Interest from the received entity

inputendpoint.name: entityInput
inputendpoint.label: Entity
inputendpoint.description: Received entity will be transform to a PoI
